Description:
Exception is thrown out when new a library and there are only XML Source and Preview tab when new a report.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v20070803-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a library and a report.

Expected result:
The library and the report is created correctly.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out when new a library and there are only XML Source and Preview tab when new a report.
